metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3497 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in OpenStack Swift 1.11.0 through1.13.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viathe WWW-Authenticate header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3497` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-swift - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.1
swift - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.1
swift-account - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.1
swift-container - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.1
swift-object - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.1
swift-object-expirer - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.1
swift-proxy - 1.13.1-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: swift package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.13.1-0ubuntu1.1').
